section.title: Configuring the Dashboard
section.para: A full example local_settings.py file is included in the Appendix of the OpenStack Install and Deploy manual. Here are some common options:

listitem.para: SWIFT_ENABLED: If an Object Storage (Swift) endpoint is available and configured in the Identity service catalog, set SWIFT_ENABLED = True.

QUANTUM_ENABLED: If a Network Connection (Quantum) service is available and configured in the Identity service catalog, set QUANTUM_ENABLED = True. The project is expected to become a core OpenStack project in the Folsom release. You can set also QUANTUM_ENABLED = False.
